articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Djokovic left vexed, argues with umpire for hindrance call in Indian Wells loss - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The loss left Novak Djokovic trophyless in 2024, having earlier suffered a semifinal loss to eventual champion Jannik Sinner at the Australian Open in January. | Tennis News
articles.content: World No. 1 Novak Djokovic, who had returned to action at Indian Wells after five years, was stunned 6-4 3-6 6-3 by lucky loser Luca Nardi as the Serb suffered a shock third-round exit on Monday. The… [+2272 chars]

articles.title: World's Largest Radio Telescope: An Innovative Project in Australia - Construction Review
articles.description: Witness the remarkable journey of the world's largest radio telescope, the SKA-Low, as it takes shape in Western Australia's Mid West region.
articles.content: Witness how the SKA-Low, the worlds largest radio telescope, begins shape in the Mid-West region of Western Australia. Ready to provide new insights into the Universes first billion years in an entir… [+6437 chars]
